entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 10:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: SE 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to rain near noon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 along parts of the coast this afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 along parts of the coast early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 this evening then west 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
